languages.text: "Вдобавок..." {n}Кассия медлит несколько секунд и отводит взгляд.{/n} "Мне известно, что низшие слуги Империума могут находить нашу внешность... отталкивающей. Ген {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} искажает черты, привычные взору плебса, а величие нашей роли неподвластно их скудным умам..."

traits.locale_text: "Это... Великая ответственность. Мы — путеводные звезды Человечества, верные слуги Его, удостоенные особого дара. Наш третий глаз способен прокладывать пути сквозь имматериум, невидимыми нитями сшивая системы и секторы Империума". {n}Девушка касается повязки на лбу и взволнованно косится на вас.{/n} "Конечно, всему есть цена, и под воздействием варпа наши тела поддаются... изменениям".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Besides..." {n}Cassia hesitates for a few seconds and looks away.{/n} "I am aware that lesser servants of the Imperium may find our appearance... repulsive. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene twists the features the rabble are used to seeing, and the magnificence of our role cannot be grasped by their feeble minds..."
languages.original_text: "Вдобавок..." {n}Кассия медлит несколько секунд и отводит взгляд.{/n} "Мне известно, что низшие слуги Империума могут находить нашу внешность... отталкивающей. Ген {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигатора{/g} искажает черты, привычные взору плебса, а величие нашей роли неподвластно их скудным умам..."

languages.text: “不仅如此……”{n}卡西娅犹豫了几秒钟，转过了头。{/n}“我很清楚，帝国的低级仆人可能会觉得我们的外表……令人厌恶。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}有着独特的基因，这让我们与那些乌合之众惯常看到的相貌截然不同。他们脆弱的头脑无法理解我们的角色有多么重要……”
languages.original_text: "Besides..." {n}Cassia hesitates for a few seconds and looks away.{/n} "I am aware that lesser servants of the Imperium may find our appearance... repulsive. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene twists the features the rabble are used to seeing, and the magnificence of our role cannot be grasped by their feeble minds..."

traits.locale_text: “不仅如此……”{n}卡西娅犹豫了几秒钟，转过了头。{/n}“我很清楚，帝国的低级仆人可能会觉得我们的外表……令人厌恶。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}有着独特的基因，这让我们与那些乌合之众惯常看到的相貌截然不同。他们脆弱的头脑无法理解我们的角色有多么重要……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Besides..." {n}Cassia hesitates for a few seconds and looks away.{/n} "I am aware that lesser servants of the Imperium may find our appearance... repulsive. The Navigator gene twists the features the rabble are used to seeing, and the magnificence of our role cannot be grasped by their feeble minds..."

languages.text: «Además...». {n}Cassia titubea unos segundos y aparta la mirada.{/n} «Sé que algunos sirvientes menores del Imperium consideran nuestra apariencia... repugnante. El gen del {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} altera los rasgos a los que la chusma está acostumbrada y sus frágiles mentes no captan la magnificencia de nuestro papel...».
languages.original_text: "Besides..." {n}Cassia hesitates for a few seconds and looks away.{/n} "I am aware that lesser servants of the Imperium may find our appearance... repulsive. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene twists the features the rabble are used to seeing, and the magnificence of our role cannot be grasped by their feeble minds..."

traits.locale_text: «Además...». {n}Cassia titubea unos segundos y aparta la mirada.{/n} «Sé que algunos sirvientes menores del Imperium consideran nuestra apariencia... repugnante. El gen del {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} altera los rasgos a los que la chusma está acostumbrada y sus frágiles mentes no captan la magnificencia de nuestro papel...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「それに…」{n}カシアは数秒ためらい、目をそらす。{/n}「帝国のしもべでない者にとっては、私たちの容姿は…ひどく嫌悪感を抱かれるかもしれません。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の遺伝子は、民衆が見慣れた特徴を歪めてしまうのです。私たちの役割の素晴らしさは、彼らの弱い心には理解できないものです…」
languages.original_text: "Besides..." {n}Cassia hesitates for a few seconds and looks away.{/n} "I am aware that lesser servants of the Imperium may find our appearance... repulsive. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene twists the features the rabble are used to seeing, and the magnificence of our role cannot be grasped by their feeble minds..."

traits.locale_text: 「それに…」{n}カシアは数秒ためらい、目をそらす。{/n}「帝国のしもべでない者にとっては、私たちの容姿は…ひどく嫌悪感を抱かれるかもしれません。{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}の遺伝子は、民衆が見慣れた特徴を歪めてしまうのです。私たちの役割の素晴らしさは、彼らの弱い心には理解できないものです…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Zudem ..." {n}Cassia zögert einige Sekunden lang und blickt dann weg.{/n} "Mir ist bewusst, dass niedere Diener des Imperiums unser Aussehen ... abstoßend finden können. Das {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}-Gen verzerrt die Dinge, die der Pöbel zu sehen gewohnt ist, und ihr schwacher Verstand kann die Erhabenheit unserer Rolle nicht begreifen ..."
languages.original_text: "Besides..." {n}Cassia hesitates for a few seconds and looks away.{/n} "I am aware that lesser servants of the Imperium may find our appearance... repulsive. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene twists the features the rabble are used to seeing, and the magnificence of our role cannot be grasped by their feeble minds..."

traits.locale_text: "Zudem ..." {n}Cassia zögert einige Sekunden lang und blickt dann weg.{/n} "Mir ist bewusst, dass niedere Diener des Imperiums unser Aussehen ... abstoßend finden können. Das {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}-Gen verzerrt die Dinge, die der Pöbel zu sehen gewohnt ist, und ihr schwacher Verstand kann die Erhabenheit unserer Rolle nicht begreifen ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « De plus... » {n}Cassia hésite pendant quelques secondes et détourne les yeux.{/n} « Je sais que notre apparence peut paraître... repoussante à certains serviteurs inférieurs de l'Imperium. Les gènes spécifiques aux {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateurs{/g} altèrent les traits auxquels le bas peuple est habitué. Sa faiblesse d'esprit l'empêche de saisir toute la magnificence de notre rôle. »
languages.original_text: "Besides..." {n}Cassia hesitates for a few seconds and looks away.{/n} "I am aware that lesser servants of the Imperium may find our appearance... repulsive. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene twists the features the rabble are used to seeing, and the magnificence of our role cannot be grasped by their feeble minds..."

traits.locale_text: « De plus... » {n}Cassia hésite pendant quelques secondes et détourne les yeux.{/n} « Je sais que notre apparence peut paraître... repoussante à certains serviteurs inférieurs de l'Imperium. Les gènes spécifiques aux {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateurs{/g} altèrent les traits auxquels le bas peuple est habitué. Sa faiblesse d'esprit l'empêche de saisir toute la magnificence de notre rôle. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Üstelik..." {n}Cassia birkaç saniyeliğine tereddüt edip bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n} "Görünüşümüzün İmparatorluk'un alt mertebe hizmetkârlarına... İtici geldiğinin farkındayım. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} geni yüzünden simamız, ayaktakımının görmeye alışkın olduklarından farklı. Üstlendiğimiz rolün önemi de âciz akıllarınca kavranabilecek gibi değil."
languages.original_text: "Besides..." {n}Cassia hesitates for a few seconds and looks away.{/n} "I am aware that lesser servants of the Imperium may find our appearance... repulsive. The {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} gene twists the features the rabble are used to seeing, and the magnificence of our role cannot be grasped by their feeble minds..."

traits.locale_text: "Üstelik..." {n}Cassia birkaç saniyeliğine tereddüt edip bakışlarını kaçırıyor.{/n} "Görünüşümüzün İmparatorluk'un alt mertebe hizmetkârlarına itici geldiğinin farkındayım. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} geni yüzünden simamız, ayaktakımının görmeye alışkın olduğu gibi değil. Üstlendiğimiz rolün önemi de âciz akıllarınca kavranabilecek gibi değil..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
